title: Unapologetically Insane Tales
description: Would you walk into an asylum of insane tales?20 pieces of short fiction, housed in this collection. Strange diseases, old heroes, a windfall, scenes from memories. A creepy cupboard, a day at the shrink's, six black limericks.Avant garde and provocative - a madhouse.You're invited to walk in.
author: Zed Yeo
